EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-C00056.Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Stay a step ahead of your competitors!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Global Partner Program The Nokia Select Technology Program for partners gives you a first look at Nokia’s controlled released portfolio and access to our newest technology and emerging solutions. You’ll also get extensive information on more mature technology solutions with Nokia’s best-in-class product and services portfolio, allowing you to stay a step ahead of your competitors! Contact Nokia <[[mailto:nokia_global_partner_communications?subject=I%20have%20a%20question%20about%20the%20Select%20Technology%20Program%20for%20partners]]> to schedule a consultative meeting where, together, we can explore how to best help you achieve your business goals.
Nokia Partner Marketing & Communications Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
